Защита от поджигозавров Congratulations, Commander! It has been weeks of hard-fought battles, but we have finally put down the rampaging Terraknor. It should go without saying that between us and almost every other force on this planet that the Terraknor have been taken to extinction. No matter, as they were far too unstable for long term military application. That said, we have been able to re-purpose the Cerulea Controller items to be more general purpose, and I’ve already identified another specimen of Cerulean fauna that can be suitably….."weaponized": I call it the Lancer! Ядро Прореживателя Open for a chance to win the following: 1x Synthetic Control Core 1x Incineraptor 2x Battle Cruiser 200x Bombas 100x Bombas 100x Shrikes 100x Titans Edgeworld has run into a few rough spots this week. Many players are ending up with upgrades or research stuck, receiving blank messages in their mail, or being forced to refresh the game every time they load.

The Edgeworld team really appreciates the patience of all our players, and the helpful and informative messages you've been sending us through our help desk. Our engineers have prepared a fix for the problem, and you should be seeing dramatic improvements by the end of the week. If you're still having problems, please send us a message using the 'Help' link beneath the game window.

As a gesture of thanks while we work through this, we're giving three Zoot Tokens to every player. Those Tokens will be added to your inventory automatically. Good luck, and thank you for playing Edgeworld! НА ПЛАТИНУ! Исследуйте бомбоносов до 4 ур. Win a Cerulean Fireproof Shield Part! Заплатка модератора As one of our valued players, we'd like your feedback on how Edgeworld can serve'you better. Your comments and suggestions are very important to us, so we’d love to hear from you! Please help us by taking a short survey and participating in a moderated chat session.

If you are able to participate, you will receive a $50 Amazon gift card and be entered into a sweepstakes for another $50 Amazon gift card.

To begin, please click on the link below. If this does not work, please cut and paste the address into your web browser.

http://survey.confirmit.com/wix/p1752505458.aspx?SAM=2

Thank you for your participation. Your insight is invaluable to us.

Sincerely,

James Holloway

Увеличивает добычу урана на 300% в течение 24 часов. побеждай врагов The BRAND NEW Equipment Part Crafting system has been released! By taking your Basic and Rare Equipment Parts and combining them with the new Crafting Alloys, you can get even stronger Rare and Cerulean Equipment Parts like the Cerulean Armor! In order to access this new feature, click ‘View Equipment’ on your Engineering Lab building and the click the ‘Craft’ tab to find the new crafting recipes that you can use to make new Equipment Parts and Mystery Boxes. The Tier 1 Rare Part Box provides you with the lowest chance to get a Rare Equipment Part with 3 Bonuses, and that chance is increased dramatically through the Tier 3 Rare Part Box that GUARANTEES you a Rare Equipment Part with 3 bonuses! You may have seen players in your Sector chat speaking in various languages. To give you more control over your Edgeworld chat experience, we created the "Global Chat" and "My Language" chat channels.

By default, My Language is ON and Global Chat is OFF. Global Chat goes to all players in your sector who have Global Chat turned on, regardless of language.

Here are all of our current Chat channels. You can change your settings by clicking on the wrench next to the chat window.

Global Chat Color: Orange
Access Code: /w
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who have Global Chat enabled, regardless of language.

My Language
Color: White
Access Code: None
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who share your language. Note: English is a language. Currently this feature supports French, Italian, German, and Spanish; any other languages default to English.

Alliance Chat
Color: Blue
Access Code: /a
Function: Communicates with all players in your Alliance.

Group Chat
Color: Green
Access Code: /g
Function: Communicates with all players in your chat group. Click on a name in chat to invite them to your group.

Moderators
Color: Yellow
Access: Work for Kabam
Function: Moderator accounts have bright yellow text. If a Mod talks, you should listen! Alliance Expansion Event Проект ударной волны Новое содержимое ящиков трофеев! Besides getting designations on the Lifetime Force leaderboard, the Overlord of the Sector also gets a special Banner to display on their base and show off this distinction to any player that scouts their base. Temporary but devastating, Mines come to the battlefields of Cerulea IV. Place Mines around your base and they will be invisible to your enemies, but when attacking troops approach, they will explode for massive damage!
Mines are only good for one use, and any that have exploded will need to be rebuilt. However, Mines triggered during Defense Simulations will not need to be rebuilt. The number of Mines that can be built on your base at any time is determined by the level of your Factory!

О чем пойдет речь, неизвестно, но они встретятся лично и наедине. Нам необходимо узнать цель этой встречи! Если Хелио и Эрази объединят свои силы, это может радикально изменить ход войны, причем не в нашу пользу. Место тайных встреч находится под наблюдением одной из баз Эрази. This weekend, build Incendiary Turrets and research Pulse Tanks to win! The higher your building/research level, the more chance you have to win!

Ten players in each sector who build Incendiary Turrets will win 10 Incendiary Cores!

Ten players in each sector who research Pulse Tanks will win 10 Pulse Cores!

You don't need Cores to start building these weapons, so try them out - anyone can win! We’ll announce the winners on Tuesday, October 11. Good luck!

The Maar Confederacy was once a mutually beneficial alliance between the sovereign world governments. But when the Cerulean threat nearly destroyed civilization, the Confederacy changed from a benevolent partnership to a martial dictatorship.

The Maar Confederacy still believes that every base on Cerulea IV is rightfully part of the Confederacy, and owes them loyalty and taxes. Their aggression is a threat to the societies and economies of planets across the galaxy.

The Helio Legion and the Erazi Syndicate don't deny the growing Maar threat. In fact, they're willing to provide some 'assistance' to three Commanders in each Sector who prove the most disruptive to Maar operations.

One Commander Level 1 to 100: 250,000 Energy, 250,000 Uranium, 1 Combat Strategy

One Commander Level 101 to 500: 1 million Energy, 1 million Uranium, 2 Combat Strategies

One Commander Level 501 and up: 4 million Energy, 4 million Uranium, 3 Combat Strategies

To win, launch as many attacks as possible against Maar bases between 12:00 Saturday morning to 12:00 Monday night (PST)!

Picking on weaklings isn't sporting - only battles against bases that are at least 1/2 your level will count!

Details and full rules are in the forums! Let the battle begin!

Greetings Commanders, The Edgeworld Community Team would like to remind all our fellow players that we have been working on the forum features: new content have been posted recently and there’s a lot more to come. Our intention is to treat the player community with the deserved care and attention, in order to get your involvement not only as gamers, but also as community participants. We have a special deal available right now for our experienced Edgeworld players! Lots of players are taking advantage of this bonus Platinum, and you can too!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Visit the Platinum Store through the 'Get Platinum' button at the top of the Edgeworld window.

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

This table shows exactly how much additional Platinum you'll receive!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!

Флаг башни Теслы для флаг-башни Version 2.0 of the Edgeworld Force Tournament System is now live and Lifetime Force will be continuously calculated for player actions even when Tournaments are not running. Upgrading Buildings, upgrading Research, Spawning Troops, Upgrading Equipment, Upgrading General's Skills and PvP will now always award players with Lifetime Force. Tournament scores will continue to only record select categories of Force depending on the Tournament Type. For example Buildings and Research Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Buildings and Research Force; Troop Training and Equipment Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Training and upgrading Equipment. Retroactive Total Lifetime Force scores are now in process of calculation and an update will be provided when Total Lifetime Force scores for all players has been completed. Armed with these two active skills, he is an even stronger force to reckon with!

The Teleport skill allows the General to instantly move to a new location on the enemy base. Once Teleport reaches level 10+, this skill can be charged to teleport not only the General, but also the troops around him!

Ballistic Missile allows you call in air support for the General, damaging all builds in a radius around Strom. When Ballistic Missile is level 10+, this skill can be charged to increase the size of the area of damage.

How to Play Zoot's Jackpot: Click play to start the game. After each round, you have a chance of landing on four types of tiles. Prize: you may choose to either CLAIM or RISK the prize to play the next row. Each row contains more valuable prizes and better Jackpot odds, but also has a higher chance of landing on a Skull. Platinum: you enter the Platinum Round. In the Platinum Round, you may choose 10 tiles. You win the total of all the Platinum contained in these 10 tiles! JACKPOT: you win the Progressive Platinum Jackpot! Every game play increases the Jackpot and each Jackpot win resets the counter. Skull: you receive a consolation prize and the game ends. Each game costs 25 Platinum to play. Playing higher rows does not cost additional Platinum, but you run the risk of losing your prize. The game ends after a prize is claimed, at the conclusion of a Platinum Round, after a Jackpot win or after landing on a Skull. Плацдармы невозможно разрушить, пока в них находятся бойцы. The Maar Confederacy has created a program of subsidies, tax cuts, and bonus items for the Commanders who help them gain revenge on the Erazi Syndicate.

Это единственная черная дыра, в которую не следует бояться бросать деньги. Today we are happy to announce the launch of an exciting new feature, Engineering Lab Part Enhancements! Now you will have the ability to further customize your Engineering Lab Parts and by extension your base defenses to further combat your enemies in Edgeworld. What exactly are Enhancements? Enhancements are additional bonuses that can be applied to your existing Engineering Lab Parts through the use of new "Enhancement Tokens". Each Lab part now will have 2 available Enhancement Slots, so if you fill these slots your existing parts will instantly become more powerful! These Enhancement Tokens will not provide flat bonuses, however, but are tied to the Upgrade level of the Engineering Lab part it is attached to. This means that these bonuses will scale along with the upgrade level of the part, and will increase just like any normal part stat. Here are the steps to take in order to get started: 1. Visit the "Parts" tab within your Engineering Lab and left click on the desired Engineering Lab Part to bring up the item menu 2. Select the new "Enhancements" option 3. Here you will see a list of Enhancement Tokens you either own or are able to purchase. Click on the desired token and click "Enhance" to add the effect to your Engineering Lab Part! 4. Now you can view the extra stats that have been added to your part, and once equipped will instantly increase your defense! How can you get your hands on these new tokens? Currently there are 2 ways! 1. 3 basic tokens will initially be available for purchase in the Enhancement Screen of each part. -Armor Token - Applies a small scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Boost to Splash Radius 2. In addition to these basic tokens, 5 others will be available through the Wheel Game! These following 5 possess a higher power level then the previous 3 listed: -Armor Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Boost to Splash Radius -Scope Token - Applies a bonus to the part's Range -Liquid Coolant - Applies a bonus to the part's Attacks per Minute Отправить The Onyx Core is in the Store now for 25% OFF for a Limited Time Only!
